Termitron/Nightlight::

"We should quick him out colony and let them destroy him"  said 
angered the bug-bot"AND NO!!!! I DON't.. "

"Ter..mitron, Take care Trinity..." Said weakly Nightlight, she added
"Where's she Termitron?? Is she safe???" 

"She's safe, Your Majesty" said Termitron with a kind tone "You can 
trust me... Anything will happen her and you will be ok too... AND 
YOU COLONY'S ENEMY" saidn angered Termitron "I SHOULD DESTROY YOU 
HERE!!! AND I'M GOING TO DO IT IF I SEE YOU AROUND THE QUEEN!!! DO 
YOU HEARD ME!!!!"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Termitron!  Gramps is no longer a threat.  We can deal with 
him after 
> the two at the door.  THEY are the threat.  If you want to protect 
the queen, 
> you should go there instead of attacking Gramps.  There will be 
plenty of 
> time for punishing Gramps after the battle."
